item.title: 2 nursing students die in car accident, 3 injured
item.description:
<![CDATA[Hyderabad: In an unfortunate incident, two nursing students died in a car accident in Telangana's Gadwal town recently. Two female students died on the spot, while three others were critically injured.
As per the IANS report, a car ran amok in Telangana's Gadwal town on Tuesday, killing two nursing students and injuring some others.
The incident occurred on Tuesday evening when students of a nursing college were waiting for a bus at a bus stop to go to their hostel.
According to police, the S...]]>
item.author: Kajal Rajput
